name: Tomb
description: A burial chamber holds a plain stone casket. The Tomb card suggests buried secrets and things long forgotten.

person.upright: A person with a secret or a gap in their memory.
person.reverse: A person trying to atone for a dreadful secret in their past.

creatureTrap.upright: A mummy, wight, or similar Undead that lairs in its own tomb.
creatureTrap.reverse: An incorporeal Undead (such as a wraith or specter) that's not linked to the place of its death, burial place, or body.

place.upright: A tomb, especially one that is forgotten.
place.reverse: A memorial structure that doesn't contain a body.

treasure.reverse: An art object depicting a dead individual as they were in life.

situation.upright: A situation no one wants to talk about or even acknowledge.
situation.reverse: A situation stemming from a buried secret that recently came to light.
